page.title: 20SUMMARY
page.content: {..Summing-Up Village.. The old idea of the country person is not to be found any longer.The oldest inhabitants have moved with the times using cars & buses to get them to the towns & super-markets.The school break -in by outside people moving from one place to another by van is an alarming development.The proposed motor-way M4o, although useful to the commuters could alter local roads & convenience. Hedges have already been planted to screen from the proposed site.Wyatt's farm remains as a typical Warwickshire farm house,stables & barns have been converted into houses,the old forge has long since disappeared & is now a house.White House Farm is now a modern bungalow,never used as a farm!The farm buildings have been converted to other bungalows with garages.The residential part is separate from{farm business.
